mapper.insert: insert into kgst.eas_document ( document_id, draft_id, writer_id, document_type, document_attribute, bill_id, has_deadline, deadline_dt, document_language, document_theme, document_status, digital_yn , sender_id , sender_name, sender_dept_cd , document_num )values ( #{documentId}, #{draftId}, #{writerId}, #{documentType}, #{documentAttribute}, #{billId}, #{hasDeadline}, #{deadlineDt}, #{documentLanguage}, #{documentTheme}, #{documentStatus}, #{digitalYn}, #{senderId}, #{senderName}, #{senderDeptCd}, #{documentNum} )
